products.name: Basics To Advanced In React
products.overview: Master React from the fundamentals to advanced concepts with this comprehensive course.
products.long_description: Dive deep into React development with this course covering everything from the basics to advanced techniques. Learn how to build powerful, interactive user interfaces using React's component-based architecture.

products.name: Django Framework for Beginners
products.overview: Kickstart your journey into web development with Django, the high-level Python web framework.
products.long_description: Explore the world of web development with Django, a powerful framework for building web applications with Python. This course is perfect for beginners, covering everything you need to know to get started with Django development.

products.name: The Future of Design Systems
products.overview: Explore the cutting-edge trends and technologies shaping the future of design systems.
products.long_description: Discover the latest advancements in design systems and learn how they are shaping the future of digital design. From responsive layouts to modular components, this course covers everything you need to know to stay ahead in the world of design.

products.name: The Complete Guide to Backend Development
products.overview: Master backend development with this comprehensive guide covering all aspects of server-side programming.
products.long_description: Take your backend development skills to the next level with this comprehensive guide. From setting up servers to handling databases and APIs, this course covers everything you need to know to become a proficient backend developer.

products.name: Build a Blockchain from Scratch in Go
products.overview: Learn how to build your own blockchain from scratch using the Go programming language.
products.long_description: Delve into the world of blockchain development with this hands-on course. Learn how to build a decentralized ledger system from the ground up using Go, a powerful and efficient programming language.

products.name: Frontend Fastlane Plan With Projects
products.overview: Accelerate your frontend development journey with this fast-paced course featuring practical projects.
products.long_description: Get ready to level up your frontend development skills with this fast-paced course. From building responsive layouts to optimizing performance, this course will teach you everything you need to know to become a proficient frontend developer.

products.name: Master the Code Review
products.overview: Hone your software engineering skills by mastering the art of code review.
products.long_description: Learn how to conduct effective code reviews and provide constructive feedback to your peers. From identifying bugs to improving code readability, this course covers all aspects of the code review process.

products.name: JavaScript Basics To Advance With Shubham
products.overview: Learn JavaScript from the basics to advanced topics with expert instructor Shubham.
products.long_description: Join Shubham as he takes you on a journey through JavaScript, covering everything from the fundamentals to advanced concepts. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this course has something for everyone.

products.name: Python Deep Dive With Projects
products.overview: Take a deep dive into Python programming with hands-on projects.
products.long_description: Explore the depths of Python programming with this course featuring hands-on projects. From basic syntax to advanced topics like web scraping and data analysis, this course covers everything you need to know to become a proficient Python developer.

products.name: Mastering Software Technique
products.overview: Gain mastery over software development techniques with this comprehensive course.
products.long_description: Learn the ins and outs of software development with this comprehensive course. From design patterns to debugging techniques, this course covers everything you need to know to become a proficient software developer.

products.name: Web Development Foundation
products.overview: Build a solid foundation in web development with this comprehensive course.
products.long_description: Get started on your journey into web development with this comprehensive course. From HTML and CSS to JavaScript and beyond, this course covers everything you need to know to build interactive and responsive websites.

products.name: Mastering Git and GitHub - A Practical Guide
products.overview: Become proficient in Git and GitHub with this practical guide.
products.long_description: Learn how to effectively use Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration with this practical guide. From basic commands to advanced workflows, this course covers everything you need to know to become a proficient Git user.

products.name: Everything About React v16
products.overview: Learn everything you need to know about React version 16, covering advanced concepts and best practices for building powerful web applications.
products.long_description: Become proficient in React v16 with this comprehensive course. Learn about hooks, context API, error boundaries, and more. Master techniques for state management, routing, and optimizing performance to create scalable and maintainable React applications.

products.name: Diving Deep With Python 2.7
products.overview: Delve deep into Python 2.7 with advanced topics and practical examples.
products.long_description: Explore the depths of Python 2.7 with this advanced course. Discover topics such as metaprogramming, concurrency, and Pythonic patterns. Gain hands-on experience with real-world projects and enhance your Python skills to the next level.

products.name: Kickstart Your UI Design Career
products.overview: Jumpstart your career in UI design, learning essential principles and tools from industry experts.
products.long_description: Embark on a journey to kickstart your UI design career with this comprehensive course. Learn fundamental design principles, typography, color theory, and layout techniques. Gain hands-on experience with industry-standard tools like Adobe XD and Figma. Build a solid foundation in UI design and launch your career with confidence.

products.name: HTML5 Mastery: A Comprehensive Guide
products.overview: Master the fundamentals of HTML5 and learn how to create stunning web pages and applications.
products.long_description: Dive deep into HTML5 with this comprehensive guide. Learn how to structure your web pages using semantic markup, harness the power of new HTML5 elements, and enhance your websites with multimedia content. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this eBook will equip you with the skills you need to create modern, responsive web pages.

products.name: CSS3 Essentials: Styling Your Web Pages
products.overview: Unlock the power of CSS3 and transform your web pages with stunning styles and animations.
products.long_description: Take your CSS skills to the next level with this essential guide to CSS3. Explore advanced styling techniques, including flexbox and grid layouts, animations, and responsive design. With practical examples and hands-on exercises, you'll learn how to create beautiful, engaging web pages that work seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes.
